nodes.text: Around 3642 BBY, Darth Baras's apprentice was sent to hunt for Jedi Knight Xerender, a target of Baras' plan to wipe out the strongest leaders of the Galactic Republic with the initiation of the new conflict with the Sith Empire. The Sith Lord joined forces with the Talz exile Broonmark and eliminated the Jedi and his force of Talz Commandos.
